ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Stupid Names (was Gnome Kabobs) (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: My girlfriend and I made two gnomes...Mine is a female gnome cleric named Yihn, and hers is a male gnome rogue named Yhang.  (three letter names aren t allowed
ygData.messageBody:
My girlfriend and I made two gnomes...Mine is a female gnome cleric named
Yihn, and hers is a male gnome rogue named Yhang. (three letter names
aren't allowed so we chose Yihn instead of Yin....Yhang has an "H" so we
match).

Funny thing is only about 10% of the people we've grouped with actually
figure it out.

Here's a little help if yer struggling with it =P
Yihn, Yhang (Yin/Yang)
Female, Male
Good, Bad
Cleric, Rogue

Yhang should have been a necromancer....oh well.

Ruldaas Riverdance
